comments:
I ran a project in profile mode on a local web server.  I started the profile with the J2EE Request Profiler Agent, and monitoring Memory Analysis, Execution Time, and Method Code.

I ran through my web app watching the profiling view from time to time.  From the Profile/Logging Perspective, I right clicked my profile project and selected Terminate.  An NPE was thrown to my console log.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui 4 4 2006-10-02 08:48:59.296

 events/second: 140, elapsed time: 230 seconds

Hi Joanna, This seems like a bug in the IAC code.

Thanks Eugene.  Given that the IAC was replaced with the AC in 4.4, I am resolving this problem (which references 4.2.1) and asking the product team to resubmit if they can reproduce the problem with the current TPTP version.
